summary.Title: Chef, Arctic Panorama Lodge, Norway
summary.Presentation:
Arctic Panorama Lodge As, Uløybukt, Norge, is looking for a Chef.
Arctic Panorama Lodge Northern Norway's only spa resort.
We are now looking for Chef in our kitchen at Arctic Panoram

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Arctic Panorama Lodge As, Uløybukt, Norge, is looking for a Chef.

Arctic Panorama Lodge Northern Norway's only spa resort.

We are now looking for Chef in our kitchen at Arctic Panorama Lodge for permanent job.

Your main objective is Chef in our kitchen. We believe you are an outgoing person with passion for the travelling industry. You are detail oriented and focused on the good guest experiences.

Sounds like something for you?

We are looking for someone who is:

  • Open, warm, and friendly
  • Someone who values a good working environment, and actively contributes to one
  • Professional and personal in your meetings with guests, colleagues, and partners
  • Concerned with quality and sustainability
  • Detail oriented

Requirments for the position:

  • Permission to work within the EU/EEA

We offer:

  • Full time job
  • Varied work in a spectacular fjord-setting In northern Norway
  • Good and affordable housing close to your workplace
  • Competitive salary NOK 36 000 -- 40 000
  • A position in one of the country's leading tourism companies
  • Favorable discounts and offers on Norway's best activities and products

Our employees are the core of the business, and we want to create an inclusive and equal environment with safe workplaces.

Starting date upon agreement.

Working hours: day/evening/shift

More information:

Svein Jakobsen, owner, +47 9161 2520, svein@arcticpanorama.com

How to apply?

Send your application to Svein Jakobsen at svein@arcticpanorama.com

Latest application date is 01.06.2022.

(from NAV EURES Norway)

 

About Arctic Panorama Lodge As

The lodge is a boutique hotel and are Northern Norway's only spa resort with our own therapists for massage and skin care.

If you want to take part in a sustainable destination as offer something different something unique you are welcome to join the team at Arctic Panorama Lodge.

Our unique location on the island Uløya, which only has a handful of residents, gives us the opportunity to bring guests closer to experiences which the nature and its silence gives us.

Let us show you northern Norway from the front row and take you 70 degrees north so you can experience the Arctic experiences our seasons offer.

We want to take you on a journey where you get to experience our traditions in food, culture and history. A journey where use, and not consumption, is in focus.

Personal service and conveying our story will always be closest to our heart, and we want to share that with you.

Find silence. Get closer to nature. Connect with yourself.

https://www.arcticpanorama.com
